author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to Rep. Summer Lee, “This country has taken so much from black folks and has a debt it owes.” And while she provides zero evidence to back that claim up, we can assume she’s talking about people who have never been slaves, while charging those who have never owned slaves for ancestral crimes they have nothing to do with.


Rep. Summer Lee on reparations resolution:

“This country has taken so much from black folks and has a debt it owes because for over 400 years and to this very day this country has stolen black labor, black lives, and black futures.”

pic.twitter.com/HqvkN6zYEF
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial)
title: Democrats Are Once Again Demanding Reparations For People Who Have Never Been Slaves, Here's Their Latest Silly "Argument"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
A Palestinian UCLA student named Maya has been on a hunger strike since May 10, claiming she is protesting UCLA's alleged involvement in her “people's genocide.”

Pro-Palestine protester fumes at UCLA for not acknowledging that she is on a hunger strike as she goes 6 days without food.

Talk about a self-own.

Activist "Maya" is noticeably slimmer as she goes on one full week without food.

"UCLA claims to care deeply about the health and… pic.twitter.com/7lTLy15mSn
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg) May 16, 2025
title: Leftist college student can't understand why no one cares about her pro-Gaza hunger strike
